resource.chars:
The arms of the Brachiopoda may be 
<s>[text?]<\s> compared with those of the 
Lophophore Polyzoa - and if it turn
out that the so-called hearts are 
not such organs, one difference will be 
removed -
<s>And <\s> In conclusion, I may repeat 
what I have elsewhere adverted to,
that though the difference 
between
<s>a pal <\s> the cell of a Polyzoon and 
the shell of a <s>Brachiopod<\s> Terebratula appears 
wide enough, yet the resemblance 
between the latter <s>and<\s> with its 
muscles & the circularium of
a Polyzoon, is exceedingly close & 
striking -
